title: LEGO Star Wars: Skywalker Saga Reviews, Monkey Island Returns - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.04.22
description:
Blessing and Tim unite for a fun Monday of news! Let's talk about Lego Star Wars, Return to Monkey Island, and more!

Time Stamps - 
﻿00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
Over on Tik Tok: Roger has a review of Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga. We’ll talk about that more in the show.
Over on youtube: There’s a new episode of the Kinda Funny Xcast. That’s Mike, Parris, and Gary talking about Weird West, MLB The Show and what the new PS Plus means for Xbox. You can catch that right now on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
We also have Morbius in Review now up on Youtube.com/kindafunny and on the In Review podcast feed.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Pranksy, & Anonymous
The Roper Report  -
00:07:45 - Lego Star Wars review round up
00:15:00 - Return to Monkey Island announced - Sal Romano @ Gematsu
00:32:45 - Ad
00:35:36 - The PS Plus hack that PlayStation doesn’t want you to know… or do they?? - Robert Anderson @ IGN
00:37:12 - Could we get PS3 emulation after all? - Zarmena Khan @ PlayStation Lifestyle
00:45:56 - There’s a new Elden Ring Patch - Joe Skrebels @ IG
00:49:15 - A 2001 Demo for Gex Jr. has leaked online - Zack Zweizen @ Kotaku
00:57:36 - Out today
00:58:32 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
